question:
You wish to study at a foreign university. Write a letter to the university. 


In your letter you should ask about:
 the accommodation and fees 
possible scholarships 
and the qualifications required for acceptance.
text: I am writing this letter with reference to the application for a Master's degree in Biotechnology at your university. My name is Farhana Jabeen and currently reside in India. I would be grateful if you could provide me with the below information.Firstly, I would like to enquire about the cost of tuition fee for this particular course and details regarding accommodation offered on the campus, I would prefer a single room within the campus within my budget, so I would be glad if you could provide me with further details in terms of the available options for accommodation

Secondly, I wanted to know of any possible scholarships for my studies in order to cover the cost of expenses throughout the course of my studies. If possible, would you mind forwarding any relevant information about the same?

Lastly, I wanted to ensure if my qualifications meet the criteria to be accepted or do you have any specific requirements. At the moment, I had completed my Bachelor's degree and achieved an IELTS band score of 7.5. Please let me know if you have any other qualifications required for my acceptance
Thank you for taking the time to read my letter. I would really appreciate it if you could share the details at your earliest convenience.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
